title: Login to Pokebattler
description: Login via Google or Facebook to access your Pokebox
explanation: Pokebattler does not and can not log in to your Pokemon Go account. We do not connect to Niantic servers in any way. Pokebattler only uses this login to know who you across all your devices. You can login on your phone or tablet or computer and see all the Pokemon that you have entered into our site. We do not share your information or use it for marketing purposes or any other way.
privacy: For more information, see our privacy policy

details.description: Your trainer information below will be used to customize the site and will be displayed to other users.

logout.title: Logged out
logout.description: You have been successfully logged out. Come back later on any device and your Pokebox will be there waiting for you!
